title: Can't log into support and ask why i don't have my gold draven icon
body: I followed the instructions and since i already have all legendary and ultimate skins i gifted a friend a legendary skin for the icon and still haven't received it, i was wondering how long it takes to apply my love of draven

replies.body:
Hmm...I've been hearing reports every so often about not being able to log into the support site, so if there's any more information you could provide on what's happening (is it preventing you from logging in, is it logging you in then immediately logging you out, etc.), it'd be super helpful!

For the Draven icon, they'll start to be distributed after the promotion is completed (which is April 11 23:59 PST).  Depending on how many icons we're granting, it could take up to a week for the icon to be on your account (though typically much much sooner).
I still don't have the icon. Is something wrong?
